title: UNAI — Luxury Minimal Corporate Multi-Page Website

requirements.text: Establish a global design system and theme foundation: primary background #BDD8E9, accent palette (#001D39 Deep Navy, #0A4174 Royal Blue, #49769F Muted Blue, #4E8EA2 Teal, #6EA2B3 Soft Blue, #7BBDE8 Highlight Blue). Load Google Fonts: Playfair Display (or Cormorant Garamond) for all headings with large letter-spacing, Inter for all body text. Define CSS custom properties for all palette colors, spacing (8pt grid), and corner radii (16–28px). Apply 120px+ vertical section padding and max-width 1200px content container globally.

quotes: Headings: Modern serif (Playfair / Cormorant / Canela style)
Body: Clean sans-serif (Inter / Neue Haas Grotesk / SF Pro style)

acceptanceCriteria: All pages render with #BDD8E9 as the background base color
Headings use Playfair Display or Cormorant Garamond with generous letter-spacing
Body text uses Inter or equivalent clean sans-serif
All six accent colors are available as CSS variables and applied consistently
Section padding is at minimum 120px top/bottom on all major sections
Content is constrained to max 1200px and horizontally centered

requirements.text: Implement global premium UI features: (1) Custom cursor — a small soft circle that scales up on hoverable elements. (2) Page load animation — a brief full-screen fade/slide reveal with the UNAI logotype before content appears. (3) Smooth page transitions — fade or slide between routes (300ms ease-in-out). (4) Dark / Light theme toggle — dark theme uses #001D39 background with light typography; toggle persists to localStorage. (5) Scroll-reveal animations — elements fade and translate up (20px) into view on scroll using IntersectionObserver. (6) Reusable glass morphism card component: backdrop-filter blur(12px), background rgba(255,255,255,0.12), soft box-shadow, border rgba(255,255,255,0.2), border-radius 20px.
acceptanceCriteria: Custom cursor is visible and scales on hover over interactive elements
Page load animation plays once per visit before content is shown
Route changes animate with a smooth fade or slide transition
Dark/light toggle is accessible from the navbar and persists across sessions
Scroll-reveal fade-up animation fires for all major content blocks
GlassCard component renders with correct blur, translucent background, soft shadow, and rounded corners

requirements.text: Build a persistent global Navbar and Footer. Navbar: UNAI logotype (serif, left-aligned), navigation links (Home, About, Services, Products, Events, Careers, Gallery, Contact), dark/light toggle icon, and a 'Talk to Us' CTA button. Navbar is sticky with a glass morphism background on scroll. Footer: minimal dark navy (#001D39) background, UNAI logo, nav links, tagline 'Technology with Purpose', and social icon placeholders. Section dividers between pages should use unique SVG or geometric line motifs instead of plain horizontal rules.

quotes: CTA: Explore Services / Talk to Us

acceptanceCriteria: Navbar is present on all pages and links route correctly to each page
Navbar becomes glass-morphic (blurred background) after scrolling 50px
Dark/light toggle is visible in the navbar
Footer renders on all pages with navy background, logo, and links
Section dividers use a unique geometric or typographic motif, not a plain <hr>

requirements.text: Build the Home page with six sections: (1) Full-screen parallax hero — split layout: left side has large serif heading ('Enterprise Technology. Reimagined.'), subtitle, and two CTAs ('Explore Services', 'Talk to Us'); right side has an abstract 3D-style tech visual (Three.js scene with floating geometric shapes or animated SVG). Parallax: background geometric shapes scroll at 0.3x speed relative to foreground. Floating glass cards overlay with micro-stats. Subtle particle layer. (2) About Preview — Z-pattern: left image, right text block with glass overlay card showing metrics: '12+ Years Experience', '350+ Projects Delivered', '18 Industries Served'. (3) Services Cards — 4 large glass cards: AI Solutions, Enterprise Systems, Digital Transformation, Consulting & Strategy. Each card has a custom icon, one-line descriptor, hover elevation (translateY -8px, shadow deepens), and animated border reveal on hover. (4) Products Highlight — horizontal scroll parallax strip with 3–4 product mockup cards sliding at 0.6x scroll speed; section title 'Our Products' floats above. (5) Events & Innovation — full-width dark navy (#001D39) section with high-contrast white heading, event preview cards, and a 'View All Events' link. (6) CTA Footer Section — minimal centered: large serif 'Let's Build the Future Together', subtext, and 'Start a Project' button.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero is full viewport height with a split left/right layout
Parallax depth effect is visible on scroll (background shapes move slower than content)
Two hero CTAs are present and link to /services and /contact
About preview section follows Z-pattern with glass metrics card overlay
Services section renders 4 cards with hover elevation and border animation
Products highlight section has horizontal scroll behavior with mock product cards
Events section has a dark navy background with white typography
CTA footer section renders the 'Let's Build the Future Together' headline

requirements.text: Build the About page with a magazine-style asymmetrical layout containing: (1) Full-width typographic hero: large serif statement 'Technology with Purpose' with a side abstract image. (2) Vision & Mission section — asymmetric two-column: oversized faded numeral or icon on one side, mission text on the other. (3) Leadership Philosophy — centered large quote typography: 'Innovation with Integrity', followed by 2–3 philosophy pillars in a horizontal card row. (4) Why UNAI — 3-column icon grid with concise value propositions. (5) Horizontal scrolling Company Timeline — year markers and milestone text cards that translate horizontally on scroll (scroll-linked animation). (6) Team Culture section — minimal portrait placeholders in a grid; on hover, image slightly zooms, a soft overlay appears with name and role.

quotes: Team culture (minimal portraits with hover reveal)

acceptanceCriteria: About page hero displays the serif statement 'Technology with Purpose'
Vision & Mission, Leadership Philosophy, and Why UNAI sections are all present
Timeline section scrolls horizontally as the user scrolls vertically (or has a horizontal drag/scroll container)
Team grid items reveal name and role overlay on hover with smooth zoom transition
Layout is asymmetric and magazine-inspired, not a uniform two-column grid throughout

requirements.text: Build the Services page with alternating split-screen sections for each service. Each section: one half is a large visual/illustration placeholder, the other half is the service name, description, and a 'Learn More' link — alternating left/right layout for each row. Services: AI Development, Enterprise Software, Cloud & Infrastructure, Data & Analytics, Consulting. Add large faded vertical typography in the background of each section (e.g., 'AI', 'CLOUD') at ~8–10% opacity as a design motif. Include a vertical animated process timeline at the bottom: a vertical line with nodes that animate in (scale + fade) as they enter the viewport, each with a step title and brief description.

quotes: Each Service: Left image / Right description

acceptanceCriteria: Five service sections render with alternating left/right image-text split layout
Faded vertical background text is present for each service section
Vertical process timeline is present at the bottom of the page
Timeline nodes animate in as they enter the viewport on scroll
Each service section has a 'Learn More' interactive element

requirements.text: Build the Products page as a premium product showcase. Each product block contains: a large mockup image placeholder, product name in large serif type, a short specs line, a bulleted feature list, and a 'Request Demo' CTA button. Include at least 3 product entries. Add a Comparison Section below: a minimal grid table comparing products across key feature rows — clean lines, no heavy borders, alternating soft row shading.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 product showcase blocks are rendered
Each product has a mockup image, name, specs, feature bullets, and 'Request Demo' button
A comparison grid/table is present below the product showcases
Comparison table is minimal with clean lines and no heavy borders

requirements.text: Build the Events page with a card masonry layout. Event categories: Conferences, Product Launches, Tech Summits, Webinars. Each event card: category tag, date, event title, short description, soft glass card style with hover elevation. Include a parallax full-width banner section with the headline 'Where Innovation Meets Industry' over a dark navy background with a subtle layered depth effect. Add a category filter row (All / Conferences / Product Launches / Tech Summits / Webinars) that filters the visible cards with a smooth fade transition.

quotes: Add parallax banner: 'Where Innovation Meets Industry'

acceptanceCriteria: Events are displayed in a masonry or irregular card grid layout
Category filter row filters events with a smooth animation
Parallax banner with 'Where Innovation Meets Industry' is present
Event cards include category tag, date, title, and description
At least 6 sample event cards are populated across the four categories

requirements.text: Build the Careers page with: (1) Culture Statement — full-width typographic section with a large serif headline and subtext about UNAI's culture. (2) Why Work at UNAI — horizontal row of 3–4 benefit cards with icons, each with a hover micro-interaction (soft lift). (3) Open Positions — accordion layout: each role is a collapsed row showing title and department; clicking expands to show description and an 'Apply Now' link. (4) Application CTA — minimal centered section: 'Shape the Future with Us' heading and a primary CTA button. (5) Soft animated background gradient — a very slow, subtle CSS gradient animation that shifts through the blue palette shades in the background of the culture statement section.
acceptanceCriteria: Culture statement section renders with large serif headline
Why Work at UNAI section has at least 3 benefit cards with hover effects
Open positions accordion renders with at least 4 sample roles that expand/collapse smoothly
Apply Now link is present inside each expanded accordion item
Application CTA section is present at the bottom
Animated background gradient is visible in the culture section (slow, subtle, no harsh flicker)

requirements.text: Build the Gallery page with a CSS masonry grid layout (varied card heights). Display at least 12 gallery items. Each item: on hover, the image slightly zooms (scale 1.05), a dark overlay fades in, and a title appears over the image. Category filter bar: All / Events / Products / Office — filters items with a smooth fade/reorder animation. Gallery items are categorized and filtered client-side using React state.

quotes: Hover: Blur background / Title overlay / Smooth zoom

acceptanceCriteria: Gallery renders in a masonry grid with varied card heights
At least 12 gallery items are present, distributed across four categories
Hover effect shows zoom, dark overlay, and title text simultaneously
Category filter buttons are present and functional, filtering items with animation
Filtering is client-side and instantaneous (no backend call)

requirements.text: Build the Contact page with a split-screen layout: Left half contains a minimal contact form with glass-style inputs (rounded corners 20px, semi-transparent background, soft border, focus glow in #7BBDE8). Form fields: Full Name, Company, Email, Phone, Message, and a 'Send Message' submit button. Right half contains: a stylized placeholder map block (minimal flat-style rectangle with grid lines and a pin icon, no external map service), and below it: company contact details (address, email, phone) in clean typography. Page headline: large serif 'Start the Conversation.' spanning above the split layout. Form submission stores the message in the backend (Motoko actor) and shows a success confirmation inline.
acceptanceCriteria: Page headline 'Start the Conversation.' is rendered in large serif typography
Split-screen layout is present with form on left and map+info on right
Form inputs have glass morphism styling with rounded corners and soft focus glow
All six form fields are present and validated (name, company, email, phone, message)
Submitting the form calls the backend actor to store the contact message
A success confirmation message appears inline after successful submission
Right panel shows a stylized placeholder map and company contact details
No external map API is used

requirements.text: Implement React Router-based multi-page routing for all 8 pages: /, /about, /services, /products, /events, /careers, /gallery, /contact. Each route renders the corresponding page component. Navigation links in the Navbar and Footer route to the correct page. All routes are handled client-side.

quotes: Home, About, Services, Products, Events, Careers, Gallery, Contact

acceptanceCriteria: All 8 routes are registered and render the correct page
Navbar links navigate to the correct routes without full page reload
Direct URL access to each route renders the correct page
404 / unknown routes redirect to the Home page

requirements.text: Backend (Motoko): Implement a single actor that stores contact form submissions. Define a ContactMessage record type with fields: id (Nat), name (Text), company (Text), email (Text), phone (Text), message (Text), timestamp (Int). Expose: submitContact(name, company, email, phone, message) → async Nat (returns generated ID), getContacts() → async [ContactMessage] (admin read). Use a stable array or stable HashMap for persistence across upgrades.
acceptanceCriteria: submitContact function accepts all five fields and returns a unique ID
All submitted messages are stored in stable state
getContacts returns all stored messages
The actor compiles without errors in Motoko

requirements.text: Generate all required static visual assets for the website: hero abstract tech background image, about section feature image, placeholder product mockup images (3), placeholder team portrait images (6), placeholder gallery images (12 across categories), and a service illustration for each of the 5 services. Store all generated images in frontend/public/assets/generated. Reference them by relative path in the frontend components.

quotes: Team culture (minimal portraits with hover reveal)

acceptanceCriteria: Hero background image exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/
Product mockup images (3) exist and are referenced in the Products page
Team portrait placeholders (6) exist and are referenced in the About page
Gallery images (12) exist and are referenced in the Gallery page
Service illustration images (5) exist and are referenced in the Services page
All images load without 404 errors

constraints: Primary background color must be exactly #BDD8E9; do not substitute
No external map APIs (Google Maps, Mapbox, etc.) — use a styled placeholder
No heavy gradients, no generic SaaS template aesthetics
All font loading must be from Google Fonts (Playfair Display + Inter) with font-display: swap
All animations must be subtle — no over-animation or distracting motion
Do not edit any file under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
No external real-time or WebSocket features
All routing is client-side React Router; no server-side rendering
nonGoals: Blog or news feed with dynamic external content
